thread.title: PC maker Lenovo unveils 27-inch whopper ‘tablet’ in S.F.
thread.title_full: PC maker Lenovo unveils 27-inch whopper ‘tablet’ in S.F. - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: PC maker Lenovo unveils 27-inch whopper ‘tablet’ in S.F.
text:
Photo: Connor Radnovich, The Chronicle Dilip Bhatia (right), vice president of worldwide marketing and user experience, demonstrates how the Lenovo laptop can be used in tight spaces, like on an airplane, during a launch event for the new Lenovo Yoga 900 laptop in San Francisco, California, on Monday, Oct. 19, 2015. Dilip Bhatia (right), vice president of worldwide marketing and...
Lenovo introduced new portable computers in San Francisco on Monday as the world’s biggest PC maker tries to gain more ground on Apple in the U.S. market. Dilip Bhatia (right), vice president of worldwide marketing and user experience, demonstrates how the Lenovo laptop can be used in tight spaces, like on an airplane, during a launch event for the new Lenovo Yoga 900 laptop in San Francisco, California, on Monday, Oct. 19, 2015. Dilip Bhatia (right), vice president of worldwide marketing and...
Lenovo introduced new portable computers in San Francisco on Monday as the world’s biggest PC maker tries to gain more ground on Apple in the U.S. market.
